name: core-enforcer
effect: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has already moved this turn, its ability is nullified.
short_effect: Nullifies the target’s ability if it moves earlier.

flavor_text.sun_moon: If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on have already used their moves, this move eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on have already used their moves, this move eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on have already used their moves, this move eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.
